Posts.Content: Thanks Julia, I kinda thought that but thought I'd give it a shot. Can't find anything on Google and I guess there's a reason for that. I'll have a follow up appointment soon so I'll ask then, will put the response on here just in case anyone's interested. hope you're doing fine now. linda
Posts.Title: What now?

Posts.Content: Hello all, I wonder if someone can answer what is probably a naive question.  I've just had 10 RT sessions to reduce tumours under my arm and in my neck to aid with nerve pain.  Will my tumours start growing again after a certain time? Or does RT last forever? Or will I have to have more RT in the future? Meant to ask these questions at the hospital but forgot! Thank you Linda
Posts.Title: What now?

Posts.Content: Thank you mistymoley, that's helpful, I will keep you posted. Linda xxxxx
